programmes.show_description: Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep230
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep231
A man sues his cousin's girlfriend for misappropriating money he gave her to make car payments. S16, Ep229
A man accuses his estranged son of stealing his truck and tools after he fell from a roof; the son claims his father assaulted him. S16, Ep230
An army sergeant claims her ex-boyfriend's ex-wife destroyed her clothes and military gear when she allegedly doused them with bleach. S16, Ep231
A woman claims her half sister charged her plastic surgery on a joint credit card; she sues for the unpaid balance. S16, Ep232
A landlord is accused of fraudulently evicting a tenant due to a foreclosure; he countersues for a lost 'cash for keys' deal. S16, Ep233
New York cousins fight over a car that was allegedly borrowed and returned damaged. S16, Ep234
A woman sues her ex-lover for driving her car without her permission and wrecking it. S16, Ep235
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep225
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep226
The latest forensic technology is used to analyse a postcard that could incriminate a religious figure who took part in war crimes. S5, Ep13
At the end of a murder mystery event, a real death occurs. S6, Ep12
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
DI Steve Keogh uncovers secrets in Terry Daddow's 1991 murder. DCS Kevin Moore, DCI Brian Foster, psychologist Dr Donna Youngs, and son Oliver Daddow share insights. S1, Ep5
Detective Keogh and team solve Sinead Healy's murder by her ex-partner Kenneth Lynch. Forensics, mobiles, CCTV and a sister's testimony reveal the truth. S1, Ep6
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Cayley Mandadi was a 19-year-old sophomore at Trinity University when she arrived at a hospital in Texas in 2017. She was nearly naked, bruised and wasn't breathing. S36, Ep15
The latest forensic technology is used to analyse a postcard that could incriminate a religious figure who took part in war crimes. S5, Ep13
At the end of a murder mystery event, a real death occurs. S6, Ep12
Investigators turn to forensic evidence, when CCTV footage of a convenience store murder proves too fuzzy to be of any use. S5, Ep14
Whilst out riding with her husband, a woman dies in an apparent riding accident. S6, Ep13
DI Keogh and DCS Whittaker probe Gary Dean's murder. Insights from Bache and Langley reveal a feud, leading to the Dawsons' conviction. S1, Ep7
Detective Keogh and team uncover nurse Kevin Cobb's crimes of rape and manslaughter. Parallel investigations, drug evidence, and a friend's lead reveal all. S1, Ep8
Cyclist Moriah Wilson arrived in Austin, Texas, in May 2022 to prepare for the Gravel Locos bike race. One evening, her friend found Wilson had been shot multiple times. S36, Ep16
When a young woman goes missing, her lurid call girl image is revealed, and her clients are all suspects in her disappearance. S5, Ep15
A twisted killer murdered prostitutes and left their bodies in plain sight. S6, Ep14
When a gym teacher was found shot to death, the police suspect his wife of foul play, and a videotape recorded by the victim reveals his strange marriage. S5, Ep16
A tragic tale in which cattle auctions were tainted by false cheques and homeless men were shot dead. S6, Ep15
A woman accused of crashing into another driver and her children and leaving the accident scene admits she had no driver's license or insurance. S16, Ep236
A woman insists she saved her son and his fiancée from being evicted by paying their rent; she demands payback. S16, Ep237
A New York woman sues her ex-friend for an unpaid loan to buy a 1991 Nissan 300; she claims they dated. S16, Ep238
A woman accuses her friend of neglecting to put her car in park, causing it to roll down a hill and hit a parked car. S16, Ep239
A woman claims a fellow partygoer repeatedly kicked her car after he was asked to leave the premises. S16, Ep240
A young man dips into his $10,000 savings account from his grandfather to help a friend's mother; he sues her for repayment. S16, Ep241
A woman claims a fellow motorist sideswiped her vehicle while making a left hand turn and sues for damages. S16, Ep242

DI Steve Keogh uncovers secrets in Julian Webb's 1994 murder. DCS Kevin Moore, psychiatrist Dr Sohom Das, and reporter Paul Cheston share insights. S1, Ep9
Detectives reveal how they solved the 2013 manslaughter of 8-year-old Ayesha Ali by her mother and her lover. A forensic psychologist explains the twisted relationship between the killers. S1, Ep10
When Ray Wright suddenly lost contact with his family, they knew something was wrong. Two days later, his brother confronted an intruder in Ray Wright's home. S36, Ep17
The body of a man living under an assumed name is found tied to an anchor. Will his watch and tattoo be enough to identify him? S5, Ep17
The inspection of a woman's skull found in a lake reveals she was brutally butchered. S6, Ep16
Police suspect a depressed heart surgeon took his own life, until they uncover his wife's lust for money and penchant for violence. S5, Ep18
Top notch forensic science helps solve crimes. A gang of experienced criminals stage a series of complicated bank robberies. S6, Ep17
A man sues his ex-girlfriend for vet bills and property destroyed by her dog Boo Boo despite the fact he is now the pet's owner. S16, Ep243
A woman and her daughter are suing an ex-friend claiming he illegally repossessed the car they purchased from him. S16, Ep244
A stay-at-home mother sues her unemployed ex-husband for money owed from their joint tax return. S16, Ep245
A woman sues her ex-boyfriend for loans to pay taxes on jackpot winnings, and to make his truck payment. S16, Ep246
A child breaks a TV when she hits the screen with a Wii remote; her parents are sued by their former friend for damages. S16, Ep247
A man sues his former friend for the cost of Dallas Cowboys' season tickets he purchased on her behalf; he claims she never gave him any money. S16, Ep248
A teenager insists he had no idea he was buying a stolen laptop from a man standing outside a convenience store who said he needed cash fast. S16, Ep249
